aka: Hyper Projection Play "Haikyuu!!" The Strongest Challengers
this_title: ハイパープロジェクション演劇えんげき「ハイキュー!!」"最強さいきょうの挑戦者チャレンジャー"
trans_title: Hyper Projection舞台剧“排球少年!!”最强挑战者
Hyper Projection Play "Haikyuu!!" The Strongest Challengers
introduction: Hyper Projection Play "Haikyuu!!" Fly High is the ninth stage play adaption of Haruichi Furudate's Haikyū!! series. The play combines manga, live-play, and video to continue to challenge the "top" of theater and achieve further evolution.
